data.message: Meh not big on politics, don't care for the presidency anyways so no big whoop there. Always been a fan of his music, he hates trump so what? Sure alot of what he was saying wasn't all true. Shakes head and sighs, you have To stop believing everything on the news media brother man not all of it is true. To speak out and call someone out at least check your source's before you try to dis on someone or else you go from a man on a mission to a complete ass clown haha. Next time you freestyle please make sure your spot on with your dirt before you try to one side dis some old guy lol
